article: A great many people are disappointed because of unrealistic expectations. Walking up to a department store's cloth counter, a(n)  _  young woman said, "I want to buy this material for a new dress. How much does it cost?" "Only one  _  per yard," replied the smirking male clerk. Not to be taken back by the funny words, the woman said," That's fine! I'll take ten yards." With  _  written all over his face, the clerk  _  measured out and wrapped the cloth, then held it out teasingly,  _  forward to receive his "  _  The woman got the package quickly from the clerk and pointed to a little old man standing beside her. "Grandpa will pay the bill instead of me," she  _  . He was no doubt disappointed. But in the course of living, many people are  _  when others do not  live up to  their expectations. In order to be happy, some expectations must be dropped. These three particular  _  and unhealthy expectations are some of the main causes: 1. Expect too much  _  .When others say, "Thank you," or in any way to show their gratitude, be happy. It is a gift! 2. Expect others to make you happy. They simply cannot do that. Make yourself happy and  _  your joy with others. 3. Expect not to be  let down  . At times, people will simply not come through for you in the way you need.  _  them and move on. Get rid of these three unrealistic expectations and you can begin to expect more  _  right away!
